text: The Costume Designers Guild Award for Excellent in Fantasy Film is one of the annual awards given by the Costume Designers Guild. Before 2005, the category was combined to also include period films. The 1998 inaugural awards year combined period, fantasy and contemporary films. ==Winners and Nominees for Film== Movies marked with a dagger (†) won the Academy Award for Best Costume Design. Movies marked with a double dagger (‡) were Academy Award nominees. ===1990s=== {| class="wikitable" width="95%" cellpadding="5" |- ! width="10%" | Year ! width="45%" | Film ! width="45%" | Costume Designer(s) |- | rowspan="5" style="text-align:center;"| 1998 || style="background:#FAEB86;" | Pleasantville || style="background:#FAEB86;" | Judianna Makovsky ‡ |- | Beloved || Colleen Atwood ‡ |- | The Man in the Iron Mask || James Acheson |- | The Mask of Zorro || Graciela Mazón |- | The Truman Show || Marilyn Matthews |} ==Winners and Nominees for Period/Fantasy Film== ===1990s=== {| class="wikitable" width="95%" cellpadding="5" |- !
